item.description:
This is our first attempt at meeting the needs of those who need an alternative to Monday nights. Member Vera Meyer has offered her home in Malden, less than a mile from the Oak Grove T station, as an alternative location. All members welcome to either or both meetups. Note that a suggested conversational topic is the book, "Spiritual Evolution: A Scientific Defense of Faith" by George Vaillant.
http://www.amazon.com...

See you there?
item.name: The Cambridge Brights Alternative Meetup
